scripts.build: tsc && npm run build-styles && vite build
scripts.build-capacitor: tsc && npm run build-styles && vite build --config vite-capacitor.config.ts
scripts.android: npm run build-capacitor && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
scripts.ios: npm run build-capacitor && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.electron: npm run build-capacitor && npx cap sync @capacitor-community/electron && npx cap open @capacitor-community/electron
scripts.create-android: npm run build-capacitor && npx cap add android
scripts.create-ios: npm run build-capacitor && npx cap add ios
scripts.open-android: npm run build-capacitor && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.open-ios: npm run build-capacitor && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
